data.title: Ultimate Dreamforce Parties & Events 2023
data.meta_description: One of the best parts of Dreamforce is the parties, and there are some great ones that you won't want to miss out on this year!
data.text:
The biggest event in the Salesforce calendar is fast approaching, with Dreamforce kicking off on September 12th. As many seasoned Trailblazers will know, Dreamforce is the kind of event you really need to plan for, so we hope this post helps you plan your more recreational activities.

Salesforce Ben has been putting together this list since 2016, and after a two-year hiatus, we’re proud to bring you the best parties and events Dreamforce has to offer!

Salesforce Ben Dreamforce Parties

AfterParty GPT

Salesforce Ben is heading to Dreamforce… and we’re bringing the party with us!

After the success of our first party in 2022, we’ve decided to cross the pond to throw our next big bash. Inspired by the Summer of AI, we’ve locked down one of the best venues in the city to throw AfterParty GPT. You can expect live music, DJ sets, and a well-stocked bar.

Details: 7pm – 1am, Tuesday 12th, 1015 Folsom

Registration

ThrillFest

Why not make your pre-gaming part of the main event with Salesforce Ben at ThrillFest?

We’ll be hosting a happy hour at Thriller Social Club in San Francisco – stop by on your way to Dreamfest for pre-concert drinks, snacks, and good old-fashioned arcade games!

Details: 4pm – 8pm, Thriller Social Club

Registration

Monday 11th

ElementsGPT Kickoff Party

Get into the Dreamforce spirit with Elements Cloud’s kickoff party just a block away from Moscone. Network, meet some new friends, plan your sessions to attend, and boogie the night away!

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Elements Cloud Spaces, 95 3rd St

Registration

Argano Sunset Social

If rooftop views, an open bars, heavy appetizers, and some great Salesforce networking sound like your thing, then you need to head to the Argano Sunset Social on the Monday before Dreamforce. Space is limited!

Details: 5pm – 9pm, Rooftop at Via San Francisco South Beach

Registration

Marketers Welcome Bash

Be prepared to kickoff an unforgettable week at Dreamforce with a Welcome Bash blowout, surrounded by budding fellow marketers!

Details: 6pm – 9pm, The Pink Elephant Alibi

Registration

Tableau and MuleSoft Welcome Reception

Kickoff your Dreamforce experience in style with Ryan Aytay, CEO of CEO of Tableau and a group of other industry leaders over drinks, sushi, and live music.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, PABU Izakaya

Registration

OSF Digital’s Global Welcome Party

OSF Digital extends its warm welcome to global clients and colleagues in this great networking welcome party. Expect a relaxed environment where you can enjoy bites, beverages, networking, and fun before the main event.

Details: 7pm – 10am, Hotel Zetta

Registration

Customertimes Pre-Dreamforce Party

‘No keynotes or speeches, just great food & drinks in a relaxing atmosphere.’

If you’re after a quieter environment but don’t want to miss out on any great networking, and delicious Spanish food and drink, then this party is for you. This event is invitation-only.

Details: 5:30pm – 8:30pm, Coqueta

Registration

Customertimes Dreamforce Breakfast

Customertimes is hosting the ultimate no-frills, relaxing Dreamforce breakfast so that you can start your experience on a high. After all, there’s a lot of walking, learning, and fun times ahead – you’ve got to get a good breakfast in!

Details: 7am – 10am, Spaces (Next to Moscone)

Registration

Introhive Launch Party

Introhive warmly welcome you to their exciting launch party to celebrate the launch of The Client Intelligence Cloud! Explore this new product and network with industry trailblazers and peers, all while noshing delicious food and crafted cocktails.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Persona

Registration

EMEA Community Gathering at Dreamforce

Join the EMEA Community Gathering at Dreamforce, organized by the Developer Relations team. You can forward to having some drinks together, network and enjoy! The number of spots is limited, so get registered now.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Peacekeeper (The Mezzanine)

Registration

E Komo Mai Welcome Party

Kick off Dreamforce 2023 in style at the E Komo Mai Welcome Party hosted by Crowe. Connect with fellow attendees, industry influencers, and our team of experts in a relaxed and vibrant atmosphere.

Details: 4pm – 7pm, Pagan Idol

Registration

Valtech x Dreamforce Wine Tasting and Dinner

The Valtech team is kicking off Dreamforce with a wine tasting and dinner experience. Tag along for the opportunity to indulge in some delectable local wines and connect with Salesforce professionals from across the globe.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Winery Collective

Registration

Tuesday 12th

AfterParty GPT

Salesforce Ben is heading to Dreamforce… and we’re bringing the party with us!

After the success of our first party in 2022, we’ve decided to cross the pond to throw our next big bash. Inspired by the Summer of AI, we’ve locked down one of the best venues in the city to throw AfterParty GPT. You can expect live music, DJ sets, and a well-stocked bar.

Details: 7pm – 1am, 1015 Folsom

Registration

The RevOps Dream Team Happy Hour

Start your week off strong with the The Revenue Optimists and Traction Complete after the first day of Dreamforce. You can expect great conversations, tasty eats, and craft beers and wines from San Francisco’s foodie scene. Even if you’ve not explored RevOps yet, this party isn’t one to miss as for every attendee, a donation will made to the Make-A-Wish Foundation.

Details: 5pm – 9pm, Soma Eats on 2nd

Registration

Dreamforce Queer Happy Hour

This happy hour is a great place to meet and connect with other queer-identifying people in a comfortable, relaxed environment.

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Blackbird, 2124 Market St

Registration

Gearset’s DevOps Breakfast

Grab a coffee and something to eat while you meet friends and get energized for Dreamforce! Chat with our inspiring DevOps Leaders and Gearset’s experts, to get tips on deployments, CI/CD pipelines, backup, test automation, data management and more.

Details: 7am – 10am, Westin St. Francis, Yorkshire Room

Register

An Intergalactic Night Party

Described as a ‘cosmic celebration’, this intergalactic party will send you to outer space for some fun at all corners of the universe! (Well, kind of.)

Details: 7pm – 12am, 715 Harrison St

Dreamforce After Party Bash

If celebrating 20 years of Dreamforce, drinks, and dim sum sound like your thing, then you don’t want to miss out on this Dreamforce After Party Bash! Catch this event in the Twitter building in Northern Duck – a convenient 10 minute walk from Moscone.

Details: 4:30pm – 8:30pm, Northern Duck

Registration

SlalomFest

This after party with Slalom promises a brilliant art installation, delicious food and drink, and some great DJ beats to get the evening flowing. Sound interesting? Catch the event at the stunning Minna Gallery.

Details: 5pm – 10pm, Minna Gallery

Registration

Apps Associates’ Happy Hour

Connect with the Apps Associates’ team team to kick off Dreamforce 2023! Expect food, drinks, and a great opportunity to meet and network with the Apps team, and what they can do for your customers.

Details: 5:30pm – 7:30pm, Local Kitchen & Wine Merchant

This event has now sold out.

After Dark

As cool as the mysterious name, After Dark is an ‘exclusive VIP experience’ hosted by OwnBackup. With not much more revealed about the event, if you want to be in the know, register now. We have a feeling you won’t want to miss it.

Details: 8pm, Location TBD

Registration

Modern Sales Pros Free Happy Hour for Sales Leaders

Sip. Connect. Dominate. Join sales managers, leaders, ops, and enablement pros from all over the world at this epic FREE party featuring delicious food, drinks, and the company of some of the coolest sales pros in the world.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Madare

Registration

Gerent x Salesforce Happy Hours

Gerent are not hosting one or two, but four amazing happy hours for you to enjoy. Spread across two venues over two nights – Buena Vida and Jamber – you can expect a great blend of authentic, international flavors, flowing drinks, and relaxed networking opportunities. On Tuesday 12th, there will be one happy hour at Buena Vida Cantina for those in the Salesforce manufacturing, automotive, and energy industries, and one happy hour at Jamber for those in education and nonprofit.

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Buena Vida Cantina and Jamber

Registration

Metazoa’s Dreamforce Happy Hour

Embrace the artificial intelligence future of trailblazing technology with a side of complimentary appetizers and cocktails. Sounds cool right? Alongside the happy hour, Metazoa are also hosting a two day event on the 12th and 14th, uncovering their discoveries of the power of AI. Catch all the action the American Bookbinders Museum.

Details: (Happy hour) 4pm – 6:30pm, American Bookbinder’s Museum

6StreetDigital Dreamforce Happy Hour

Get ready to be delighted! You’re cordially invited to an extraordinary Happy Hour event, hosted by none other than 6Street Digital, at the lively Social 303 in the heart of San Francisco’s SOMA community. Connect with fellow Dreamforce attendees, Salesforce enthusiasts, and industry professionals in a relaxed and engaging environment!

Details: 4pm – 8pm, Social 303 (Smokehouse BBQ)

Registration

Sailing Toward Quality Excellence – All Aboard with Provar and Flosum!

Wanting to try something a little bit different at Dreamforce this year? Why not hop on a boat with Provar and Flosum for apps, drinks, and dancing as we sail the China Basin, just one mile from Moscone West. Network with other Dreamforce attendees and swap quality excellent stories, find solutions to your QA and DevOps struggles, or simply connect with old and new friends. This event is 21+.

Details: 6:30pm – 8:30pm, Pier 40, South Beach Harbor

Registration

Revenue Grid Wine and Cheese Soirée

Join Revenue Grid at an exclusive, invite-only Wine and Cheese Soirée. This special occasion promises to be an exquisite gathering filled with delightful flavors and engaging conversations, as well as an interactive tasting led by the renowned expert Laura Werlin. Don’t miss out!

Details: From 6pm, One Market Restaurant

Association Professionals Happy Hour at Dreamforce

As the only happy hour dedicated to associations at Dreamforce, if you’re an association professional, this happy hour is not one to miss. Connect and come together with other like-minded people in a vibrant, jazzy atmosphere; perfect after a day well spent at the main event.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, Dawn Club

Registration

RSM and Prodly Networking Reception at Dreamforce

Join RSM and Prodly for a fun and exciting networking reception at Dreamforce. Hear from Max Rudman, CEO at Prodly and Founder of SteelBrick, in conversation with RSM’s Paul Morgis as they discuss their experiences in helping clients establish a successful CRM strategy. After that, relax with some beautiful craft cocktails. Perfect.

Details: 4:30pm – 7:30pm, Per Diem, Financial District

This event has now sold out.

Copado Dreamforce 2023 After Party

End day one of Dreamforce 2023 on a high note at Copado’s happy hour! Join us at Hotel Zetta to toast your favorite Trailblazers and celebrate the Salesforce ecosystem. Expect games, prizes, an open bar, live music and tasty appetizers.

Details: 6pm – 8pm, Hotel Zetta

Registration

Opsera’s Dreamforce Breakfast

Start your Dreamforce week off strong with some breakfast, coffee and tea with your friends at Opsera. Here you enjoy a great breakfast and equally great networking opportunities, as well as good coffee, Dreamforce survival tips, goodies, and more.

Details: From 7:30am, The Westin St. Francis

Registration

Royal Cyber Dreamforce Bowling After Party

Join Royal Cyber and get ready to roll, network, and learn how businesses are assembling their digital commerce strategies just like you’ll be assembling those strikes on the bowling lanes!

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Yerba Buena Ice Skating & Bowling Center

Registration

Communications Industry Happy Hour

End day 1 of Dreamforce 2023 on a high note with a communications industry happy hour hosted by Nespon. Connect with new friends, celebrate Salesforce, and enjoy some live music, great food, an open bar, and some top-notch swag.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, Lyon & Swan Supper Club

Registration

Evening Oasis

Join Atrium on Tuesday evening at Dreamforce at their one-of-a-kind Evening Oasis! Enjoy and unwind with other leaders after a busy day. You can expect a live DJ, themed cocktails, hors d’oeuvres, a photo booth, and great conversation, tucked away in a private venue just a few blocks away from Moscone.

Details: 7:30pm – 11:30pm, Temple Nightclub

Registration

Workato Dreamforce Welcome Party

You’re invited to The New Automation Mindset book party and happy hour at Press Club after the first day of Dreamforce, hosted by Workato & Glean! Join Workato CEO Vijay Tella for an evening of networking over amazing food & drinks with your peers at Dreamforce, where you’ll receive your exclusive gift at the door, a chance to win an AirPods Max, and more!

Details: 5pm – 9pm, Press Club

Registration

Sip, Socialize, and Strategize: Public Sector + Education Social

Join Cloud for Good for the opportunity to socialize with fellow public sector peers and engage in thought-provoking conversations that inspire innovative approaches to tackle the public sector’s challenges with technology.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, The Harlequin

Registration

A Taste of San Francisco Reception

Indulge in a vibrant culinary tapestry of San Francisco with AWS and ActivePrime. Food and beverages will be served along with fun treats, giveaways, and a special raffle for a free Data Quality Assessment!

Details: 5pm – 7pm, First Market Tower

Registration

Retailers Happy Hour: Dreamforce Tiki Takeover

Join Algolia, Salesforce, Contentstack, and Capgemini at the Dreamforce Tiki Takeover: an evening of exotic cocktails and networking with passionate retailers in an immersive Tiki Bar atmosphere – all within walking distance of Moscone Center!

Details: 5:30pm – 8pm, Pagan Idol

Registration

Service Leaders Lounge

Join and network with customer support and service executives in the tech space; register now to be in the know about the secret location! This event is co-hosted by Twig and Support-Driven.

Details: 5pm – 9pm, Location TBD

Registration

Cocktails & Conversations with Upland Software

Come join Upland Software at their special Dreamforce evening event with stunning views of the historic Ferry Building, Embarcadero Plaza, and Bay Bridge. After a busy day, this is the best spot to start your evening on September 12th. Enjoy and unwind with other leaders over cocktails, hors d’oeuvres, and great conversations.

Details: 5:30pm – 8:30pm, Sens at 4 Embarcadero Ctr

Registration

Retail & Consumer Goods Welcome Party

OSF Digital and Salesforce welcome their clients and colleagues in the Retail and Consumer Goods industries to San Francisco for Dreamforce! Join them in the historic 555 California building for food, fun, and cocktails. Mingle with your friends from OSF Digital and Salesforce, and network with other industry colleagues.

Details: 6:30pm – 9:00pm, The Vault Garden, Plaza Level

Registration

Navigating the 7 “C’s” to Keep Your Salesforce Tech Stack Afloat

Come along to Wizards of Ops’ shOPStalk from the streets of San Francisco in our Dreamforce Party Bus to learn all about keeping your tech stack afloat. Snag a live seat if you’re in town; otherwise, you can watch digitally.

Details: 1pm – 2pm, Dreamforce, Moscone Center

Registration

Wizards of Dreamforce Happy Hour

Throw on your hula skirt and join us as we celebrate an amazing community at this complimentary happy hour, hosted by the teams at Admin Within and Wizards of Ops! Space is limited so be sure to RSVP early to save your spot.

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Location TBD

Registration

DevRev’s Dreamforce Happy Hour

Enhance your conference journey with a night of networking during DevRev’s Dreamforce Happy Hour! Relax in the midst of San Francisco’s lively atmosphere and connect with industry leaders; savor handcrafted cocktails while bringing together the worlds of technology, innovation, and community.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, 141 2nd St

Registration

Vonage Happy Hour & Drag Queen Bingo

What’s better than a happy hour with bingo? Bingo with drag queens! Join Vonage for their happy hour & drag queen bingo for a relaxed and fun time with your friends at Dreamforce!

Details: 4pm – 6pm, Hyatt SOMA

Registration

Wednesday 13th

Dreamfest

The biggest Dreamforce party is back! Dreamfest 2023 is once again supporting UCSF Benioff Children’s Hospitals Foundation, and this year’s main live act is Foo Fighters! Yes, you can get excited. Note: Dreamfest access is included in your Dreamforce ticket.

Details: From 6pm, Chase Center, Warriors Way

ThrillFest

Why not make your pre-gaming part of the main event with Salesforce Ben at ThrillFest?

We’ll be hosting a happy hour at Thriller Social Club in San Francisco – stop by on your way to Dreamfest for pre-concert drinks, snacks, and good old-fashioned arcade games!

Details: 4pm – 8pm, Thriller Social Club

Registration

The Revenue Launch Pad for Dreamfest

After a busy day, celebrate RevOps with your new Dreamforce friends and Traction Complete at the Revenue Launch Pad on the Wednesday. Relax and network with brightest minds in RevOps, sales ops, and sales leadership, and enjoy some good food and great drinks (craft beers and wines) too! Like the RevOps Dream Team Happy Hour, there will be a donation made to the Make-A-Wish Foundation for every attendee.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, Soma Eats on 2nd

Registration

Computer Futures Dreamforce 2023 Happy Hour

This happy hour event is the perfect chill out event to enjoy amidst your busy time at Dreamforce. Expect good food, good drinks, and even better company!

Details: 4pm – 7pm, Wine Down SF

Registration

The Engagement Party 2023

Branded as the ‘dance party you’ll never forget’, The Engagement Party has remained the highlight of the Dreamforce experience in the nonprofit space. You can expect a hosted bar, the dance party, surprise performances, and more!

Details: 8pm – 11:30pm, Monarch, 101 6th St

Registration

Dreamfest Pump Up Party

Fancy pre-gaming for Dreamfest? This party is the place to be!

Connect with new friends and old friends alike to get the energy going for Dreamfest to make sure you’re ready to dance the night away!

Details: 4:30pm – 6:30pm, Home for Marketers at The Pink Elephant Alibi

Registration

Pickleball DF 2023

Fancy something a little bit different at Dreamforce this year? If so, why not have a go at pickleball! All skill levels are welcome and we will have prizes, swag, snacks and refreshments, and good times to be had.

Details: 9am – 12pm, The Crossing, 200 Folsom St

Registration

OSF Digital’s Dreamfest Warm Up Cocktail Reception

Join OSF Digital for a glamorous cocktail reception before Dreamfest, with Californian coastal cuisine and creative cocktails. Held at Michelin-rated restaurant Aphotic, you can expect your usual pre-gaming and networking experience to be elevated with artistic plates centering on seafood and locally sourced, seasonal ingredients.

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Aphotic

This event has now sold out.

Natterbox Pre-Dreamfest Happy Hour

Is bowling right up your alley? Got some spare time? Join Natterbox and Playvox as we roll into Dreamfest. Expect some great networking, some great food and drink, and an overall great time.

Details: 4pm – 6pm, Yerba Buena

Registration

#Bobablazers at Dreamforce 2023

Come join various community group members attending Dreamforce for fun and boba at this in-person event at Dreamforce 2023. As always, this will be a no pressure, low-key social & networking event with boba included!

Details: From 3pm

Registration

Gerent x Salesforce Happy Hours

Gerent are not hosting one or two, but four amazing happy hours for you to enjoy. Spread across two venues over two nights – Buena Vida and Jamber – you can expect a great blend of authentic, international flavors, flowing drinks, and relaxed networking opportunities. On Wednesday 13th, there will be one happy hour at Buena Vida Cantina for those in the Salesforce insurance industry, and one happy hour at Jamber where everyone from all industries are welcome.

Details: 5pm – 7pm, Buena Vida Cantina and Jamber

Registration

Dreamfest Pre-Party Happy Hour with Centro, Taskray, Prodly, Box, and Kicksaw

The ultimate happy hour experience that sets the stage for an unforgettable night at Dreamforce’s Dreamfest concert! Get yourself to the happy hour, then be bussed the rest of the way to the concert in style!

Details: From 4pm, The Brixton, 701 2nd Street San Francisco

This event has now sold out.

SaaS Connect Cocktails

Have you been looking for the single best room to connect with SaaS leaders during Dreamforce In San Francisco for Dreamforce? Grab a drink and a bite with your peers, meet other SaaS companies and leaders, and network to create partnerships.

Details: 3:30pm – 5:30pm, Hotel Zetta

Registration

Dreamforce Customer Appreciation Cocktail Party

Join us at International Smoke to celebrate you at Dreamforce 2023! Just a short walk from the Moscone Center, enjoy fresh appetizers and curated cocktails in downtown San Francisco. Network with industry peers and share valuable Dreamforce insights with experts from both Ascend and Salesforce.

Details: 4pm – 7pm, International Smoke

Registration

AdVic’s Dreamforce Bowling Event

At the Yerba Buena Ice Skating & Bowling Center, mere steps from the Moscone Center, you can bowl your cares away with free bowling, beverages, yummy treats, and relaxed conversations. We all need a break from the stress of today’s tech world, and what better way to do that than bowling?

Details: 6:30pm – 9pm, Yerba Buena Ice Skating & Bowling Center

Registration

Dreamforce ’23 Soberforce Happy Hour

You are invited to the Dreamforce ’23 Soberforce Happy Hour! Expect great guest speakers and great company, great food, and delicious signature mocktails provided by non-alcoholic beverage curator, Joshua James, from San Francisco’s own Ocean Beach Café.

Details: 5pm – 8pm, Salesforce Tower, 27th Floor Social Lounge

Registration

Together Towards Tomorrow: Nonprofit Social

Join Cloud for Good to bring together passionate individuals and organizations from the nonprofit sector to foster connections, exchange ideas, and collaborate on shaping a better future with technology.

Details: 6pm – 9pm, Hotel Zetta

Registration

Pardashians & Friends Breakfast

Join the largest gathering of Marketing Cloud Account Engagement (formerly Pardot) users at Dreamforce! Enjoy some casual networking over bloody marys, mimosas, waffles and more!

Details: 8am – 9:30am, Home for Marketers at The Pink Elephant Alibi

High Tech Talk – How Revenue Cloud Helps Companies Achieve Efficiency & Growth

Start day 2 of Dreamforce off the right way, taking part in an interactive panel discussion with OSF Digital and Avid Technology on how tech companies can achieve increased efficiency and revenue growth through the Salesforce platform (with a great breakfast!)

Details: From 7:30am, Credo

Registration

Nue + Spiff: Not-a-Dreamforce Happy Hour

Not at Dreamforce? At Dreamforce and need a break from Dreamforce? Join this event for a casual Happy Hour and RevOps talk right downtown San Francisco. Expect beverages-of-choice with a “Lightning Talk” on out-of-the-box revenue operations that bring together RevOps, Sales, CX, and Finance teams.

Details: 5pm – 7:30pm, Location TBD

Registration

ScreenMeet’s DreamMeet Party

Join ScreenMeet and enjoy delicious cocktails, heavy apps, and lively discussions, while taking in the beautiful views of the new Yerba Buena gardens before heading to Dreamfest!

Details: 3pm – 7pm, Canopy by Hilton, in The Mezzanine Bar & Lounge

This event has now sold out.

Beware of Imposters – Real World AI Applications

Come hang out with OSF Digital to get involved in live AI demos, a free book giveaway, and a raffle to win a drone!

Details: 12:30pm – 1:10pm, Room 3024, Moscone West, Level 3

No registration needed, just pop by and say hi!

Vonage Happy Hour with DJ Amy Robbins

Stop by for music from Vonage’s favorite DJ, DJ Amy Robbins, local tasty treats, hand-crafted cocktails, and plenty of opportunities for great conversations!

Details: 4pm – 6pm, Hyatt SOMA

Registration

Thursday 14th

Conga x Accenture Breakfast

Why not kick-start this busy day with a delightful, collaborative breakfast with Conga and Accenture, before indulging in a lunch with Salesforce. Network, learn, and bond over great food; what more could you want?

Details: 8am – 10am, Executive Order Bar & Lounge

Registration: Events happening at Executive Order all week. No need to register, visit the page for more info: https://conga.com/events/dreamforce-2023

Elements Wine Down

Feeling a little unbalanced after 3 jam-packed days at Dreamforce? Well worry not, as you can join this wine down session with Elements Cloud to catch up with old friends, make new contacts, and celebrate that you’ve made through the bumper event.

Details: 4pm – 9pm, Elements Cloud Spaces, 95 3rd St

Registration

10th Anniversary Amplify @DF23 Breakfast

2023 is a special year as it marks the 10th anniversary of Amplify. To celebrate the event, Amplify are coming together for the first time since 2019 and you’re invited for breakfast, a great conversation, and a couple of mimosas too!

This breakfast is welcome to everyone, whether you’re attending Dreamforce or not.

Details: 7:30am – 10:30am, The Julia Morgan Ballroom

Registration

Marketers Afterglow Party

After a busy and bustling time at Dreamforce, why not take the chance to unwind one last time before you say your farewells. Indulge in complimentary food and drinks, as you get ready to say goodbye to those meaningful connections you have crafted over the week of Dreamforce.

Details: 4pm – 6:30pm, Home for Marketers at The Pink Elephant Alibi

Registration

11th Annual michaelforce Cigar Shindig

When the keynotes have keyed, the expos exploded, and the Dreamfests fested… there’s only one thing left to do. Come have a drink and a smoke with the who’s who of Dreamforce! As one of the longest running community traditions at Dreamforce, you can still attend even if you don’t smoke, as most people don’t and come for the awesome company!

Details: From 6:30pm, Cigar Bar and Grill

Registration

Breakfast With Yottaa & ESW

As the curtain falls on an eventful Dreamforce week, there’s no better way to conclude your experience than by joining an exclusive breakfast gathering. It’s a chance to unwind and bask in the achievements and connections you’ve made throughout Dreamforce, so join fellow attendees, industry experts, and innovators to toast to a week of success and camaraderie.

Details: 8am – 10am, Marlowe

This event has now sold out.

Diving Into Data Breakfast

Get ready for a morning of data and friends (and mimosas) at the Diving Into Data Breakfast. Whether you’re a marketer, ML engineer, or tech enthusiast, this networking event is for you. This is your chance to discuss data management, hygiene, and automation strategies and best practices that you can take back to your organization.

Details: 8am – 9:30am, Home for Marketers at The Pink Elephant Alibi

ZoomInfo’s 2nd Annual GTM Ping Pong Tournament

Do you love Ping Pong? Are you looking for a different type of competitive edge amongst your peers? If you answered yes to one or both of these questions, meet us at SPIN to close out Dreamforce with drinks, food and a friendly battle for the GTM Championship title (or happily watch as a spectator!).

Details: 4pm – 7pm, SPIN

Registration

Coffee & Career Advice for Future Revenue Leaders

Wind down Dreamforce and ramp up your career trajectory. Traction Complete is partnering with Women in Revenue for a morning of collaboration and professional development.

Details: 8:30am – 9:30am, Soma Eats

Registration

Hangout Zones

Fancy a relaxed environment to escape the chaos of Dreamforce? Some of your favorite AppExchange Partners will be taking over locations for the duration of Dreamforce. This is a great chance to grab a drink, some food, and chat about the latest and greatest developments in Salesforce.

Learning Lodge @ HFM

Discover new tech, get support, and make new friends. Visit the Learning Lodge at HFM and explore “what’s next” in MOPS with live product demos and free 1-on-1 support from Salesforce & Marketing Cloud experts. Details can be found here.

The Home for Marketers

Take a break, network, and get resources to level up your Marketing Operations at The Pink Elephant Alibi. Plenty of food and games to go around! With so much going on and different events to stuck into, you can find more details here.

OpsStars 2023

If you’ve not attended OpsStars before, maybe this year is your chance! OpsStars is a community event supported by Salesforce, where you can join sales, marketing, CX, and operations professionals in a relaxed setting, and explore how to reduce friction in every aspect of your go-to-market strategy. The main event is happening on Wednesday 13th, and details can be found here.

EPAM’s Cabana: The Dreamforce Oasis

Join EPAM at The Dreamforce Oasis – offering Trailblazers a resort-like retreat away from the busy show floor and a chance to connect directly with a top-tier Salesforce partner. Relax and network in Natoma Cabana with like-minded peers at EPAM’s Cabana while enjoying exclusive panel sessions and complimentary snacks and refreshments from 9am – 10pm across all 3 days. Full details including registration can be found here.

Gerent x Salesforce All Day Events

If happy hours aren’t your thing and you’d rather get your networking done in the daytime, you can still get involved with Gerent! You can find them at Buena Vida Cantina and Jamber on the 12th and 13th, and there’s plenty of activities to get stuck into. Full details can be found here.

OwnBackup at Dreamforce

Need a break from the showroom floor? Stop by the OwnBackup Independence Hall, open for all Trailblazers throughout Dreamforce. Grab a snack, quench your thirst, or just come say hello to the OwnBackup team from the 12th to 14th. Full details can be found here.

Hands-On Workshop: Org Optimization & Process Mining

Leave Dreamforce with more than memories! Get involved on the 12th and 13th for the first event in a series of free hands-on workshops that will take you on a deep dive into org optimization – from security and performance, to well-architected recommendations and utilization. You’ll hear from experts from Box, CRM Science, and Hubbl Diagnostics, and food and beverages will be provided. Held at Box Head Office; full details can be found here.

Hands-On Workshop: Org Optimization for Financial Services

This event in a series of hands-on financial services workshops will help you optimize your Salesforce org and streamline your most critical business processes. Join financial services experts from Zennify and Hubbl Diagnostics & Process Analytics for comprehensive security risk and process analysis of your Salesforce org. Food and drink will be provided. Held at Zenn Sky Lounge on the 12th and 14th; full details can be found here.

Hands-On Workshop: Org Optimization for Nonprofits & Education

Take a deep dive into org security, optimization, and Nonprofit Cloud readiness with experts from Gerent and Hubbl Diagnostics. These nonprofit and education-focused sessions will help you gain real insights about your org to address performance or compliance issues. Food and beverages will be provided. Held at Buena Vida on the 12th and 13th; full details can be found here.

Arkus Community Day of Learning With SUMO Scheduler

Join highly certified premium Salesforce partner Arkus and ISV SUMO Scheduler for an exciting day of free consulting sessions and workshops alongside Dreamforce on Tuesday, September 12th from 9 am – 5 pm. No Dreamforce pass required. All are invited to stop by for breakfast, lunch, networking, expert consultations, or just to hang out and relax. Full details can be found here.

The Atrium Lounge

Data, AI, and CRM – together again. Are you ready for three action-packed days in San Francisco with sessions, special events, and after-hours activities? Atrium are here to welcome you at their venue only a few blocks from the conference with networking events, industry sessions, Salesforce+ streaming live, lounge space, and more. Full details here.

The Factory at Spur

Uptima, along with Logik.io, Zilliant, Enosix, Threekit, Valorx, and Propel will be hosting a space specifically aligned to executive customers in the manufacturing, medical device, business services, and technology sectors. There will be three floors of experiences including a recharge lounge, partner solution zone, presentation theatre with 10 sessions, architectural design center, and a black badge floor. Find out more here.
